definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: He had ranked himself in the numerous phalanx of unbelievers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直象其它无数怀疑者一样持怀疑态度。

sentences.english: There are some doubters even in the western villages.
sentences.chinese: 就是在西边的村落里也有一些怀疑者。

sentences.english: Some sceptics argue that this increase is mainly due to a rise in inflation.
sentences.chinese: 一些怀疑者认为该增长主要是因为通货膨胀的加剧。

sentences.english: Let the doubter arise, and himself verify the truth of such assertions.
sentences.chinese: 就让怀疑者自己去验证这些断言的真实性吧。

sentences.english: Indeed, skeptics openly wonder just who is playing whom this week.
sentences.chinese: 确实，怀疑者公开质疑本周究竟是谁玩谁。

sentences.english: The Democrats are surely the more skeptical of America's two parties.
sentences.chinese: 民主党无疑就是两党中更为怀疑者。

sentences.english: The believer is happy, the doubter is wise.
sentences.chinese: 有信仰的人是愉快的，怀疑者是聪明的。

sentences.english: Graham started off as a real skeptic but quickly turned around.
sentences.chinese: 格雷汉姆一开始也是一个怀疑者但很快就转变了看法。

sentences.english: He is a perspicacious skeptic who makes no claim to be able to explain the world.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个怀疑者和洞察者，而并不声称他的解释世界。

sentences.english: The final group of observers can be described as skeptical fence-sitters.
sentences.chinese: 最后一类的关注者可以被称作是两面倒的怀疑者。

sentences.english: Of course, there are skeptics who regard Brutus as a fraud.
sentences.chinese: 然而，怀疑者则认为布鲁特斯是个骗子。

definition: agnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that some questions about the universe are in principle unanswerable
deism, theological theory of God who does not interfere in the Universe
theism (the belief in the existence of God)
